Day 1.Description: Arrive in Tirana, check into your hotel, and explore Skanderbeg Square.

Day 2.Description: Visit the National History Museum, Et'hem Bey Mosque, and Bunk'Art.

Day 3.Description: Explore the medieval town of Kruja, visit the castle and the Skanderbeg Museum.

Day 4.Description: Travel to Berat, the 'City of a Thousand Windows,' and visit Berat Castle.

Day 5.Description: Visit the Onufri Museum and walk through the Mangalem and Gorica quarters.

Day 6.Description: Explore the UNESCO World Heritage site of Gjirokastër and visit its castle.

Day 7.Description: Take a trip to the Blue Eye, a stunning natural water spring.

Day 8.Description: Travel to the coastal town of Saranda and relax on the beach.

Day 9.Description: Explore the ancient ruins of Butrint, a UNESCO World Heritage site.

Day 10.Description: Spend the day relaxing in the beautiful beach town of Ksamil.

Day 11.Description: Travel to Himara, a scenic coastal town, and explore its beaches.

Day 12.Description: Head to Vlore and visit the Independence Monument and Museum.

Day 13.Description: Drive back to Tirana, with stops in Apollonia and Ardenica.

Day 14.Description: Depart from Tirana and head back home.

Day 1.Description: Arrive in Ljubljana, check into your hotel, and explore the old town.

Day 2.Description: Visit Ljubljana Castle, Triple Bridge, and Tivoli Park.

Day 3.Description: Explore Lake Bled, visit Bled Castle, and take a boat to Bled Island.

Day 4.Description: Hike through the stunning Vintgar Gorge near Lake Bled.

Day 5.Description: Explore Lake Bohinj and hike in Triglav National Park.

Day 6.Description: Tour the famous Postojna Cave and Predjama Castle.

Day 7.Description: Visit the coastal town of Piran and enjoy its Mediterranean charm.

Day 8.Description: Travel to Maribor and explore the city's wine culture and old town.

Day 9.Description: Take a day trip to Ptuj, Slovenia's oldest town, and visit Ptuj Castle.

Day 10.Description: Visit Celje and explore its castle and old town.

Day 11.Description: Travel to Kranjska Gora, a charming alpine village.

Day 12.Description: Spend the day hiking in the Julian Alps around Kranjska Gora.

Day 13.Description: Return to Ljubljana and enjoy a final evening in the city.

Day 14.Description: Depart from Ljubljana and head back home.

Day 1.Description: Arrive in Oslo, check into your hotel, and explore Karl Johans gate.

Day 2.Description: Visit the Royal Palace, Oslo Opera House, and Vigeland Sculpture Park.

Day 3.Description: Visit the Viking Ship Museum, Fram Museum, and Kon-Tiki Museum.

Day 4.Description: Explore Lillehammer, visit the Maihaugen Open-Air Museum and Olympic sites.

Day 5.Description: Take the scenic train ride from Oslo to Bergen.

Day 6.Description: Explore Bryggen, Fløibanen funicular, and the Fish Market.

Day 7.Description: Take a fjord cruise to explore the stunning Norwegian fjords.

Day 8.Description: Travel to Flåm, ride the Flåm Railway, and explore the surrounding area.

Day 9.Description: Explore Hardangerfjord, visit waterfalls and fruit orchards.

Day 10.Description: Take a scenic drive or flight to Stavanger.

Day 11.Description: Hike to Pulpit Rock (Preikestolen) for breathtaking views.

Day 12.Description: Visit the Norwegian Petroleum Museum and Gamle Stavanger.

Day 13.Description: Travel back to Oslo for a final evening in the city.

Day 14.Description: Depart from Oslo and head back home.

Day 1.Description: Arrive in Dublin, check into your hotel, and explore Temple Bar.

Day 2.Description: Visit Trinity College, St. Patrick's Cathedral, and Dublin Castle.

Day 3.Description: Explore the coastal village of Howth and enjoy a seafood lunch.

Day 4.Description: Visit Kilkenny Castle and explore the medieval streets.

Day 5.Description: Take a day trip to the historic Rock of Cashel.

Day 6.Description: Travel to Cork and visit the English Market and Blarney Castle.

Day 7.Description: Explore the picturesque town of Kinsale and visit Charles Fort.

Day 8.Description: Travel to Killarney and explore Killarney National Park.

Day 9.Description: Take a scenic drive around the famous Ring of Kerry.

Day 10.Description: Explore the Dingle Peninsula and visit the town of Dingle.

Day 11.Description: Travel to Galway and explore the lively city center.

Day 12.Description: Take a day trip to the stunning Cliffs of Moher.

Day 13.Description: Discover the beautiful landscapes of Connemara National Park.

Day 14.Description: Head back to Dublin for your departure.

Day 1.Description: Arrive in Marrakech, check into your hotel, and explore Jemaa el-Fnaa square.

Day 2.Description: Visit Bahia Palace, Koutoubia Mosque, and Saadian Tombs.

Day 3.Description: Explore the coastal city of Essaouira and its medina.

Day 4.Description: Drive through the Atlas Mountains and visit Ait Benhaddou.

Day 5.Description: Visit the Taourirt Kasbah and Atlas Studios.

Day 6.Description: Travel to Merzouga and prepare for a desert adventure.

Day 7.Description: Take a camel trek into the Sahara and stay overnight in a desert camp.

Day 8.Description: Drive to Fes, stopping at the Ziz Valley along the way.

Day 9.Description: Explore the medina, visit Al Quaraouiyine University, and see the tanneries.

Day 10.Activity: Day Trip to Meknes and Volubilis
Day 10.Description: Visit the imperial city of Meknes and the Roman ruins of Volubilis.

Day 11.Description: Drive to the blue city of Chefchaouen and explore its picturesque streets.

Day 12.Description: Spend the day exploring the charming blue-painted town.

Day 13.Description: Drive to Casablanca and visit the Hassan II Mosque.

Day 1.Description: Arrive in Almaty, check into your hotel, and explore Panfilov Park.

Day 2.Description: Visit Zenkov Cathedral, Green Bazaar, and Kok-Tobe Hill.

Day 3.Description: Explore the stunning landscapes of Charyn Canyon.

Day 4.Description: Discover the singing dunes and Aktau mountains.

Day 5.Description: Continue exploring the unique landscapes and wildlife.

Day 6.Description: Travel to Shymkent and explore the city.

Day 7.Description: Take a day trip to the historic city of Turkestan and visit the Mausoleum of Khoja Ahmed Yasawi.

Day 8.Description: Fly to Astana and check into your hotel.

Day 9.Description: Visit Bayterek Tower, Khan Shatyr, and the Palace of Peace and Reconciliation.

Day 10.Activity: Day Trip to Burabay National Park
Day 10.Description: Explore the beautiful Burabay National Park and its lakes.

Day 11.Description: Drive to Karaganda and visit the KarLag Museum.

Day 12.Description: Continue exploring Karaganda and its Soviet history.

Day 13.Description: Fly back to Almaty for your last night in Kazakhstan.
